channel.title: Looking for some people to work on a non-rsps project
channel.description:
It will be a project ranging over all kinds of media, from images to videos to sounds to websites to games, that will all fall together in the form of a puzzle.
Anyone interested in helping: post below and I will pick the 2/3 I want to work with me the most.

item.title: Looking for some people to work on a non-rsps project
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

I’ll be on in a second.

item.title: Looking for some people to work on a non-rsps project
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

OH, like that. Yeah, ARG’s tend to have some storyline that everyone has to figure out. You mean clues and almost detective work, something you have to think outside of the box for, not some puzzle.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for some people to work on a non-rsps project

item.title: Looking for some people to work on a non-rsps project
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Free Web Hosting

Free Web Hosting - Your Website need to be migrated

Absolutely Free Web Hosting with PHP, MySQL, cPanel and no Ads!


was one I started on a while ago.

And no, an ARG is more like a load of puzzles/hidden things across the internet (one I played recently was a very “innocent” looking video clip of a young white girl in white clothes in a white room, but when it was viewed in negative (another player did that) it had a URL across the wall that led to a police-looking page about a “missing” girl - the one in the room)

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for some people to work on a non-rsps project

item.title: Looking for some people to work on a non-rsps project
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

An ARG?

Like the whole You Shouldn’t Have Done That thing? Thats an ARG, not some puzzle thing. I understand what you’re getting at, but you’re trying to make a game, not an ARG.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for some people to work on a non-rsps project

item.title: Looking for some people to work on a non-rsps project
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

en.wikipedia.org

Alternate reality game

An alternate reality game (ARG) is an interactive networked narrative that uses the real world as a platform and employs transmedia storytelling to deliver a story that may be altered by players' ideas or actions. The form is defined by intense player involvement with a story that takes place in real time and evolves according to players' responses. Subsequently, it is shaped by characters that are actively controlled by the game's designers, as opposed to being controlled by artificial intellige...

There, that’s the idea I’m going for.

HAPPY?!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

I am the least creative person on the planet, hence why I do not have any ideas as to what the game is about, hence why I NEED PEOPLE TO DESIGN IT.

This is why nothing on this site has ever been successful. Ever.

Edit: And no krackkid, I just have suspected Manic Depressive Disorder and will be heading to a psychologist soon.

item.title: Looking for some people to work on a non-rsps project
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Can you make this thread a little less stupid?

You have no actual plan, you’re just looking for people to do stuff but they’re obviously not going to join because they don’t know what this project consists of. It’s just a blank slate.

item.source: Looking for some people to work on a non-rsps project

item.title: Looking for some people to work on a non-rsps project
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

How is it stupid?
I need people to help design the puzzles/structure of the ‘game’, how can I post them if they have not been created?

I am looking mainly for people who are creative, enjoy puzzles and enjoy creating them, and a little bit of programming knowledge may help.

Read full topic
